long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Harness the power of xiQ's personality analysis, 360-degree account intelligence and real time business alerts within Gmail. xiQ in Gmail provides you with the many capabilities: While sending or receiving an email. xiQ will automatically generate personality analysis for the people and give you actionable insights to custom-tailor your engagement.
